column3: Maintained an energetic, staccato rhythm. He frequently leaned in and used volume shifts to passionately emphasize core principles like 'candor' and 'differentiation'.
Utterly void of corporate speak. Messages were delivered with blunt honesty, using personal anecdotes to enforce a strict meritocratic philosophy.

column2: Master-class in conveying absolute conviction and authority through visceral, energetic delivery.
Zero reliance on corporate jargon; language was accessible, blunt, and highly memorable.
A vivid demonstration of 'Executive Presence' defined by sheer force of personality rather than polished perfection.
Soften delivery for highly sensitive topics
column3: Incorporate a brief empathetic preamble before delivering hard truths to broaden receptivity.
